summary: The video features a man speaking in French, likely a political figure, addressing an audience. He discusses the significant breakthrough achieved by 'Le Rassemblement National,' highlighting its historical importance. The speaker criticizes alliances made by Emmanuel Macron and Gabriel Attal with far-left formations, which he claims have deprived the French people of a policy of recovery they supported. He mentions the party's strong performance in European elections and the first round of the presidential election, securing nearly 34% of the votes. The speaker expresses concern over electoral agreements that favor the far-left, led by Jean-Luc Mélenchon. He reassures the audience that he will be there with them until victory, emphasizing the start of a new era and the hope that has been rekindled among the people. The speech concludes with patriotic sentiments, wishing long life to France and the Republic.
keywords: Le Rassemblement National, Emmanuel Macron, Gabriel Attal, extrême-gauche, Jean-Luc Mélenchon, politique de redressement, élections européennes, premier tour, 34%, accords électoraux, France, République
